General.Name: Telemasters Holdings Ltd
General.Description: TeleMasters Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunications, internet connectivity, and cloud solutions in South Africa. It owns and operates data centres; and builds and operates networks for and with customers. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Waterfall, South Africa.
General.Address: Building 2 ATT House, Waterfall, South Africa, 2090
